topic.name: RightClick
topic.title: Open Twebst Library | Documentation - RightClick Method
topic.description: Web automation method that simulates a mouse right click on a HTML web control.
topic.remarks: This web automation method simulates a right click on any HTML element using hardware or Internet Explorer events, depending on useHardwareInputEvents property. All necessary HTML events are fired up to simulate user's behavior (onmouseover, onmousemove, onmousedown, onbeforeactivate, onactivate, onfocusin, onfocus, onmouseup).
